newsitem.title: FRANCE: CANAL PLUS , NETHOLD TO SIGN DEAL SATURDAY.
newsitem.headline: CANAL PLUS , NETHOLD TO SIGN DEAL SATURDAY.

text.p: The final accord for the merger between Canal Plus and Nethold will be signed on Saturday, Canal Plus chairman Pierre Lescure said on Thursday.
"With Nethold, the definitive accord will be signed on Saturday," Lescure told a news conference.
Nethold is jointly held by the South African controlled industrial holding firm Richemont SA and MCL-Multi Choice Ltd.
"The closing of the operation will take place after the authorisations of competent authorities in the countries concerned by the merger," Lescure told a news conference.
